import React, { useState, useContext} from "react"; import { myContext } from "../../App"; import "../../styles/reportPage/Report.css"; const Report = () => { // useState is a hook that allows us to create a state variable and set it to a value const {setReports} = useContext(myContext); const [donation, setDonation] = useState(0); const [priestExpense, setPriestExpense] = useState(0); const [choirExpense, setChoirExpense] = useState(0); const [generalExpense, setGeneralExpense] = useState(0); const [date, setDate] = useState(null); const [baptism, setBaptism] = useState(""); const [firstCommunion, setFirstCommunion] = useState(""); const [confirmation, setConfirmation] = useState(""); const [covenant, setCovenant] = useState(""); const [other, setOther] = useState(""); // Functio return (
{/* Report Title */}

Reports of Eritrean Roman Catholic Church in Hamburg

{/* Financial Report Form */}
{/* Sacrament Report Form */}
); }; export default Report;
